title: Love All Play
overview: The story follows a group of high-schoolers in a badminton club, as they navigate school and teen life. Mizushima joined his middle school's badminton team full of motivation — but without a proper coach, ended up in obscurity. Nevertheless, he did eventually reach the prefectural tournament on his physical strength. Now, Ryo Mizushima joins Yokohama-Minato High School's prestigious badminton club under the legendary coach, Ebihara, and has to learn how to deal with clubmates who have very unique personalities, all while getting to work with the upperclassman he looks up to, as he strives to become a top athlete and take his high school team to the inter-high tournament.
